name: Postman Apocalypse
description:
A Fallen London fangame, documenting the plight of London's postmen as Christmas draws in. Explore the secrets of the Royal Mail, contemplate eating snow, visit many strange exciting locales. Rats? Yes.

Fallen London is © 2014 and ™ Failbetter Games Limited: www.fallenlondon.com. This is an unofficial fan work.

If things get cut off at the bottom of the screen, middle-click or click + drag. It's awkward, but it's a problem with the site, sorry!! Send bug reports to thedeskofratco@gmail.com, or yell @Spacemarine9 on Twitter.
